title: trace_block report error on block 146675
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 
```
erigon version 2021.08.2-alpha
```

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX

Commit hash : 
```
commit 155186ad3e5d1c08ca947b354a9cd0907fb83308 (HEAD -> v2021.08.02, tag: v2021.08.02, origin/stable)
```

#### Expected behaviour
get block trace result

#### Actual behaviour
report error:
```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "error": {
    "code": -32000,
    "message": "method handler crashed"
  }
}
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
```
send a trace_block request
{
    "method": "trace_block",
    "params": ["0x23cf3"],
    "id": 1,
    "jsonrpc": "2.0"
}
```

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]

goroutine 9297011 [running]:
github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/rpc.(*callback).call.func1(0xc000a78560, 0xb, 0xc0002ddcd8)

panic(0x111b020, 0xc000dc2a50)

        github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/core/vm/evm.go:286 +0x439

github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/core.ApplyMessage(0xc00081c2c0, 0x1323618, 0xc000808d20, 0xc000a78ae0, 0xeb2b8044cbf00001, 0xbf0b4357b50a1b2f, 0xca6b47d5, 0x2fefd8)

````
after upgrade to v2021.08.03 problem resolved.
